articles.title: Library of 450 film classics aims to lure audiences back to UK cinemas - The Guardian
articles.description: A huge collection of titles will be programmed on screens across the UK to complement new releases such as Tenet and Mulan, when cinemas reopen in July
articles.content: A consortium of studios, distributors and exhibitors are teaming up to present would-be cinemagoers with a hopefully irresistible package of classic films and recent hits to encourage them back into … [+2807 chars]

articles.title: Charlotte Hawkins reveals what Lorraine Kelly wears underneath the Good Morning Britain desk - Entertainment Daily

articles.content:
Good Morning Britain's Charlotte Hawkins has revealed the secret behind Lorraine Kelly's on-screen footwear - a comfortable pair of fluffy boots.
